alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jefferson County through 700 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Irondale, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Mountain Brook, Irondale, Leeds, Cahaba Heights, Shops of Grand River, Barber Motorsports Park, Lake Purdy, Brook Highland, Grants Mill Road Bridge, Birmingham Race Course, Ruffner Mountain and Liberty Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
